code: import{configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import formReducer from"../stores/Form";import storage from"redux-persist/lib/storage";import{persistReducer,persistStore}from"redux-persist";import{combineReducers}from"redux";var persistConfig={key:"root",storage:storage};var rootReducer=combineReducers({form:formReducer});var persistedReducer=persistReducer(persistConfig,rootReducer);var store=configureStore({reducer:persistedReducer});export var persistor=persistStore(store);export default store;
